amendment.description: To ensure that amounts are made available for the generic drugs program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2110 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2110 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S14009; text: CR S14009) To ensure that amounts are made available for the generic drugs program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2110 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2110 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Schumer.
